client.referral_source_category_not_selected: Referral Source Category is not selected
client.referral_source_category_not_selected_de: Please select referral source category first

client.outside_address_placeholder: e.g. 123 Main Street, New York, NY 10001
client.has_id_poor: Is the client rated for ID Poor?

family.referral_source_category_not_selected: Referral Source Category is not selected
family.referral_source_category_not_selected_de: Please select referral source category first

image.corrupted_image: Image is invalid or does not exist.
image.per_request_size: We allow only {{size}}MB upload per request.
image.error_while_uploading: There was an error uploading your image. Please try again.

case_note.meeting_type_note: Choose "Visit" only if you met with the client.
case_note.meeting_attendance: Who was there during the visit or conversation?
case_note.domain_groups_note_1: Please select all the domain groups that you supported the client
case_note.domain_groups_note_2: To remove the domain group, please remove the Task first.

enter_ngo.accepted_date_invalid: Accepted date cannot be before the Initial Referral Date
enter_ngo.exit_date_invalid: Exit date cannot be before the Initial Referral Date
enter_ngo.exit_reason_placeholder: Select reason for exit / case rejection
enter_ngo.exit_reason_required: Select at least one reason for exit / case rejection

common.no_result_desc: We're sorry what you were looking.
common.offline_noticed: It looks like you're offline, but you can still save your data offline and we'll sync it up when you're connected again.
common.data_to_sync_desc: It's looks like you have data to sync, this is important to ensure your data is up to date.
common.sync_redirect_desc: If you are currently at form screen, you will be redirected to previous screen to prevent from out-date data.

splash.no_internet_desc: Please check your internet connection and try again.
splash.reconnecting_desc: Please wait while we try to reconnect.
splash.session_expired_desc: Your session has expired. Please login again.

pin_code.pin_changed_successfully: Your pin code has been changed successfully

client.no_care_plan_found: There are no care plans found.
client.no_case_note_found: There are no case notes found.
client.no_program_stream_found: There are no program streams found.

family.remove_member_confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove this member?

tasks.no_today_tasks: There are no tasks for today.

profile.profile_info_desc: Edit your personal information which help you to get better
profile.logout_confirmation: Are you sure you want to logout?
profile.syncing_desc: Please wait until syncing is finished
profile.clear_cache_desc: Clearing the cache will delete all cached data, including pending syncs. If you want to keep your pending syncs, please sync your data before clearing the cache. You will be logged out after clearing cache

change_password.password_changed_successfully: Your password has been changed successfully

task.delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this task?
task.delete_no_permission: You do not have permission to delete this task.

case_note.remove_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this case note?

custom_form.no_result: There are no active forms found.
custom_form.delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete?
custom_form.frequency_time: This needs to be done once every {{time}}.

care_plan.assessment_note: Once you start the assessment, you have one week to complete it. You can save the assessment at any point but ensure to finish it within a week. However, you won’t be allowed to save half-way if you choose to add Task at the end of the assessment.
care_plan.remove_goal_confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove "{{goalNumber}}"?

program_stream.exit_no_permission: You do not have permission to exit from this program stream.
program_stream.enter_no_permission: You do not have permission to enroll in this program stream.
program_stream.program_maximum: Program stream has reached maximum number of clients.
program_stream.program_condition_not_match: Client does not meet the conditions to enroll in this program stream.
program_stream.already_exclusive: Client cannot be enrolled in this program stream because they are already mutually exclusive with another program stream.
program_stream.prerequisite: Client cannot be enrolled in this program stream because they are required to be enrolled in prerequisite programs.
program_stream.not_tracking_able: This Program Stream does not require any tracking form.
program_stream.tracking_able: This Program Stream is able to track the client progress.
program_stream.exit_confirmation: Are you sure you want to exit the client from this program?
program_stream.less_than_initial_date: You cannot back-date to less than initial referral date.
program_stream.less_than_accept_date: You cannot back-date to less than accepted date.
program_stream.less_than_enrolled_date: You cannot back-date to less than enrollment date
program_stream.tracking_no_permission: You do not have permission to add a new tracking.
program_stream.edit_no_permission: You do not have permission to edit this program stream.

exit_ngo.exit_confirmation: Are you sure you want to exit this client from the Organization?
